snippet: The Consumer Electronics Show displays a future of proliferating gadgetry, from the serious to the frivolous.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column on the International Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas; observes that the annual event displays a future of proliferating gadgetry, from the serious to the frivolous, noting several categories.

snippet: Offensive material is easily found with apps that come installed on most mobile devices or can be downloaded, but there are ways parents can limit this.
abstract: Bob Tedeschi App Smart column discusses safeguarding a child's mobile device from pornography; points out offensive material is easily found with apps that come installed on most mobile devices or can be downloaded, but there are ways parents can limit this.

headline.main: Safeguarding a Child’s Mobile Device From Pornography
headline.print_headline: Safeguarding a Child’s Mobile Device From Pornography

snippet: Personal computer sales to consumers were weak in the fourth quarter, according to research reports. So the major PC makers that rely most on the consumer market, Hewlett-Packard and Acer, suffered. The exception to the general weakness was Apple,...
abstract: Personal computer sales to consumers were weak in the fourth quarter, according to research reports. So the major PC makers that rely most on the consumer market, Hewlett-Packard and Acer, suffered. The exception to the general weakness was Apple, whose sales surged again.

headline.main: No Holiday Cheer for PC Makers -- Except Apple

headline.main: No Holiday Cheer for PC Makers - Except Apple

snippet: Voice-activated devices and software are beginning to flood the consumer electronics market. But will this feature catch on or become known as yet another tech-industry gimmick?
abstract: Voice-activated devices and software are beginning to flood the consumer electronics market. But will this feature catch on or become known as yet another tech-industry gimmick?

headline.main: Beyond Siri: Voice Recognition Pops Up in More Gadgets
